NeoPixelMatrix.createWordClock|block: create word clock version $version hour color $hourColor minute color $minuteColor word color $wordColor
NeoPixelMatrix.initializeMatrixInterface:
initialize LED Matrix Interface (Expert). 
Switch pin $pinSwitchTemp 
Center button pin $pinCenterButtonTemp 
Up button pin $pinUpButtonTemp 
Down button pin $pinDownButtonTemp 
Right button pin $pinRightButtonTemp 
Left button pin $pinLeftButtonTemp
NeoPixelMatrix.initializeMatrix|block: initialize NeoPixel matrix with pin $pin and brightness $brightness
NeoPixelMatrix.movingImage|block: show moving image on NeoPixel matrix | $image with color $color and speed $speed in direction $direction
NeoPixelMatrix.scrollText|block: scroll text $text with color $color and speed $speed
NeoPixelMatrix.setOnePixelRGB|block: set one pixel at | x: $x y: $y to RGB colors | R: $R G: $G B: $B
NeoPixelMatrix.setOnePixel|block: set one pixel at x $x y $y to color $color
NeoPixelMatrix.showImage|block: show image on NeoPixel matrix | $image | with color $color
